content.value:
I've been posting a blog every day this year. It has been fun and stressful.
But I'm in sight of my stretch-goal of ONE MILLION page views over the year.
I need ~3k views per day for the rest of December.
Better write some Controversial Tech Opinions™.
shkspr.mobi/blog
